entry.title: SAP Build Apps - Trying to Generate code with help of Joule to import excel file
entry.content:
Dear All,

I am new to SAP BTP and learning SAP Build Code. I am trying to create simple page where user can select Excel file and upload the data to back end table. At same time show uploaded data into frontend table.
Is this code generation possible using Joule ?
I am using trial version of SAP BTP

Regards,
Priyanka

entry.title: Unable to format SAP build output coming from LLM
entry.content:
Hi All,

I am working on an copilot created using SAP Build apps which talks with SAP AI core instance to answer queries asked .

The app works perfectly fine but the outcome lacks formats and colors which we usually see when we ask similiar questions to other copilots or chatbots.

Please find attached my apps output and other copilots output .Can you help me how I can retain the format of the outcome of LLM and display it on my application?

SAP Build 

SAP AI Core

entry.title: Execute "BAPI_BUPA_PFCT_GETFUNCTDETAIL" in RPA
entry.content:
Hi

I am creating automation in iRPA

I am using BAPI SDK

I want to execute BAPI: "BAPI_BUPA_PFCT_GETFUNCTDETAIL"

I get the following error: "Error: BAPI exception : MESSAGE_TYPE_X\n    at a._handleResponse"

I am probably setting "Imports parameters" in wrong way but I have no documentation showing me what exactly should I do.

Do you know what might cause this problem or do you have documentation for this specific BAPI Name?

 

Thank you in advance

Mateusz

entry.title: Help in SAP Build Code
entry.content:
We are currently developing a project using SAP Build Code Fullstack. As part of this initiative, we needed to integrate the schema, services, and applications from a previously developed project in SAP Business Application Studio (BAS).

The migration was successfully completed in terms of file structure and syntax. The views in test mode render correctly and maintain the same structure as in the original BAS project. However, when working in the SAP Build Code environment, we consistently encounter the following issue:

Displayed message:

"Storyboard editor for 'MonitorFacturasBuild' will be displayed without attributes due to size limitations"

Once this message appears, the entire development environment freezes, and we are unable to interact with any files or components. Reloading or exiting the page does not resolve the issue, and the problem persists with every session.

entry.title: Unable to Access External Services from SAP Build Code-Based Fiori App
entry.content:
I have developed a Fiori application using SAP Build Code which primarily handles the frontend. The application is deployed in my SAP BTP subaccount and is functioning correctly from the UI perspective.

However, when attempting to integrate external services—specifically backend services that are already deployed in the same BTP subaccount—those services are not visible or accessible in the application. I have confirmed that:

 

  • The backend services are successfully deployed and running.

  • The destinations are configured correctly in BTP Cockpit.

entry.title: How to enable a button which is initially disabled on pressing another button in SAP MDK app?
entry.content: I am working on a MDK project using SAP build code. I have created two buttons Play and Stop using button table in Sectioned Table page. I have initially disabled the Stop button. I want to enable it when the Play button is pressed. What rule do I have to write to achieve this?

entry.title: Saving the Edited Fields of Data Table to backend
entry.content:
Hi MDK Experts,

I have been creating a sap mdk application using sap build code. So, I have encountered an issue where I have to save the edited values of a Data Table and push it to backend. I have two columns in Data Table which are editable. So, I want that if someone edits the value of the editable columns and clicks on save then it should push to the backend. Can you please help me with this?

entry.title: Which Joule Command in Build Code Can Explain Each File in a Folder?
entry.content:
In buid code’s Joule, is there a command that can explain the program files in the currently open folder? I’d like to get explanations for each file in a folder I cloned from a tutorial. Also, I saw a blog where someone asked Joule questions without typing a command at the beginning—how do they do that?

Environment:
• btp: trial
• bild code: free

Tutorial: Create an Incident Management App with SAP Fiori Elements for OData V4 | SAP Tutorials

entry.title: Page Mounted Event not called in published app
entry.content:
Hey,

I implemented some logic that a record collection is called when the page was mounted.

In the preview this works just fine, but when I publish the app, it seems like the event istn't even called. I placed toast after every action in the logic tab and the first toasts (after Page mounted & Page focused) aren't showing up.

Did someone have this issue before?

entry.title: Performance difference between SAP BTP Free Account and Paid Account?
entry.content:
Hi Community,

I’m currently working with an SAP BTP Free Account and I’ve noticed some performance limitations when running applications and services (for example, SAP Build Apps, CAP services, and OData calls).

Before moving to a paid account, I’d like to understand:

  • Are there any performance differences (speed, responsiveness, system resources) between Free and Paid accounts?

  • Do paid accounts get more consistent service levels (e.g., CPU/memory allocation, faster response times, higher quotas)?

  • Is there any official documentation or benchmarks comparing Free vs. Paid accounts?

I’d really appreciate insights from anyone who has tested both environments or moved from Free to Paid.

Thanks in advance!

entry.title: Build Code Is Slow to Load and Won’t Open Properly
entry.content:
When I try to launch Build Code, it takes a long time to load and never fully starts. It remains stuck on the screen shown in the attached image.

Occasionally, it does open, but the storyboard is blank and the Joule tab doesn’t have a place to enter prompts. Is anyone else experiencing this issue? If a solution or workaround exists, please let me know.

entry.title: Error while starting the application BindMobileApplicationRoutesToME
entry.content:
Hi All,
 
I have created a new MDK app in the Mobile services portal, after creating the app,
it is showing status as Inconsistent, prompting me to do restore, after restoring getting the error as below,

Failed to restore application test.demo, error: ApplicationInstanceCreateRouteTaskProvider-https://3f74ba7atrial-test-test-demo.cfapps.us10-001.hana.ondemand.com -> ClientV3Exception: CF-UnprocessableEntity(10008): Assign a droplet before starting this app.
Failed to restore application test.demo, error: ApplicationInstanceCreateRouteTaskProvider-https://3f74ba7atrial-test-test-demo.cfapps.us10-001.hana.ondemand.com -> ClientV3Exception: CF-UnprocessableEntity(10008): Assign a droplet before starting this app.
For more details, please check the event log for this application.
2025-09-26 08:25:39 (UTC+0000)

In the BTP cockpit, BindMobileApplicationRoutesToME service/application is in stopped status. While trying to start it, getting the error as Application BindMobileApplicationRoutesToME was not deployed correctly. Please delete the application and deploy it again.

I am using BTP Trial account, US region (same issue with Singapore region)
@Jitendra_Kansal78 
 
Regards,
Srini

entry.title: Request failed with status code 503 in SAP BUILD CODE
entry.content:
Hello All,

We’re trying to connect our backend SAP S/4HANA system with SAP Build Code, but we’re getting a 503 Service Unavailable error during integration.
Could someone please guide us on what configuration might be missing?

 

Step we followed so far..

1, In BTP Cockpit, Establish a Destination xxx_xx_BuildCode with Basic Authentication with Additional properties as 

sap.processautomation.enabled=true
MobileEnabled=true
WebIDEEnabled=true
WebIDEUsage=odata_abap,dev_abap,odata_c4c,odata_gen,apihub_sandbox
sap.build.usage=odata_gen
HTML5.DynamicDestination=true
isCatalog=true
sap.applicationdevelopment.actions.enabled=true
product.name=SAP S/4HANA
BuildApps.Enabled=true
HTML5.ForwardAuthToken=true
BuildApps.ApiType=odata,rest
appgyver.Enabled=true
Authentication=BasicAuthentication
HTML5.Timeout=60000

2. Verified in BTP Cockpit → Destination shows “Reachable”

3. Opened SAP Build App → Control Tower → Add Destination and successfully added the same destination.

4, Created a project (Web + Mobile) → Navigated to Integration tab → Add Integration → BTP Destination → Selected the same destination. At this point, we receive the error:

Has anyone experienced this issue before or can suggest possible reasons for this 503 error?

Thanks in advance.

entry.title: Btp trial and sap build code with joule
entry.content:
Following the sap tutorial i am not able to create data models using joule. Getting a message like no data methods found waiting for …  stuck since without the data models the next steps wont work. Foundation is running ok and the sap build code app is installed and ok.

Did i miss a step?

entry.title: Unable to deploy Joule Skill in SAP Build Process Automation
entry.content: Hi, I have setup Joule in our project. I am able to deploy the Joule Skill in SAP Build Process Automation. I have assigned all the roles ( including extensibility developer) to to my colleagues but they are not able to deploy Joule skill and also not able to launch it. They are getting an error saying 'Project cannot be deployed by the component 'Integration Gateway'. Project cannot be deployed in this environment because the user doesn't have the required "extensibility developer" role in Joule. Please contact your administrator to get the necessary permissions.

entry.title: SAP Sales Cloud V2 Opportunity Update Extension Fields via SAP Build App
entry.content:
Hi Experts,

I am working on SAP Sales Cloud and Service Cloud V2, 

I have requirement to update Extension fields based on Some Conidtion and use them in Validation and in Dynamic Rukes.

In SAP Service Cloud V2, I have added Extension Fields in Case and able to Update using SAP Build App Update Records without any Issues.

Same way I have Created Extension fields in SAP Sales Cloud V2 , I have added Extension fields in Opportunity and follow the below method to Update the Extension fields via SAP Build App.

Step 1 : Create Destination for Sales Cloud V2

Step 2: Use the Destination to Enable the Opportunity API in Integration Tab(In SAP Build App)

Step 3 : Create Data Variable and Select the newly added API and Choose Single Record and in Property select ID/Technical ID (Opportunity UUID pass via Page Parameters)

Step 3: Add Button in SAP Build App and In logic I have added Get Record Flow Function and select the Opportunity API, and bind the Id with Page Parameters(Passing into URL),

Working Scenario for Case Extension Field

In Flow Function JavaScript we have given Input from Get Record and Output as Object

After JavaScript Output I have use to Set Data Variable as below, Using that I can see the updated value in Extension fields availaile in Data Variable.

After that I have use Update Record and pass same Data Variable as Record and I can able to update the Case Extension fields in SAP Service Cloud V2.

Not Working Scenario for Case Extension Field

 

 

Same Method same steps but Opportunity API but getting error as below:

Error Message : Subnodes must not be present in Opportunity header patch payload

If anyone have any idea how to update the Extension fields in Opportunity via Build App Please help.

Rwegards,

Meet

@SAPbuild @sapbuild_user

entry.title: Unable to Access Joule as part of SAP Build Code Test Drive tutorial
entry.content:

PS: I am using BTP Trial Account with Cloud Foundry disabled/removed.
